title: PBE issues (i know its not in the PBE boards but i cant find it.)
body: So my PBE account apparently hits level 30 after i play 1 game as well as i get the IP and RP that most PBE accounts do to buy runes and jazz, i played that game and got level 30 but didnt get the ip or rp and i cant afford the runes halp.

replies.body: Sometimes it can take some time for the PBE stipend to hit your account. I've seen it take up to 24 hours from the first game in some cases, so hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you don't see it by then. ^.^
